definition.name: CAgent Runner
definition.description: Run a CAgent AI agent with a single line
definition.author: Docker

inputs.name: agent
inputs.description: Agent identifier (e.g., docker/code-analyzer from Docker Hub, or path to .yaml file)

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.description: Prompt to pass to the agent. If not provided, uses a default based on the agent type

inputs.name: mcp-gateway-version
inputs.description: Version of mcp-gateway to use (specifying this will enable mcp-gateway installation)

inputs.name: anthropic-api-key
inputs.description: Anthropic API key (defaults to ANTHROPIC_API_KEY secret)

inputs.name: openai-api-key
inputs.description: OpenAI API key (defaults to OPENAI_API_KEY secret)

inputs.name: google-api-key
inputs.description: Google API key for Gemini (defaults to GOOGLE_API_KEY secret)

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: GitHub token for API access (defaults to GITHUB_TOKEN env var)

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: Timeout in seconds for agent execution (0 for no timeout)

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: Enable debug mode with verbose logging (true/false)

inputs.name: working-directory
inputs.description: Working directory to run the agent in

inputs.name: yolo
inputs.description: Enable yolo mode - auto-approve all prompts (true/false)

inputs.name: extra-args
inputs.description: Additional arguments to pass to cagent exec

outputs.name: output-file
outputs.description: Path to the output log file

outputs.name: cagent-version
outputs.description: Version of cagent that was used

outputs.name: security-blocked
outputs.description: Whether execution was blocked due to security concerns

outputs.name: secrets-detected
outputs.description: Whether secrets were detected in output

outputs.name: prompt-suspicious
outputs.description: Whether suspicious patterns were detected in user prompt
